description: A massive pirate ship the size of an island, commanded by Gecko Moria. It serves as the base of operations for the Thriller Bark Pirates and houses hundreds of zombies created by Dr. Hogback and animated by Moria's powers.

keyEvents.title: Inuppe Refuses to Attack Nami
keyEvents.description: On Thriller Bark, Inuppe demonstrates that Sanji's chivalrous shadow cannot be forced to harm women, even when ordered.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals an important limitation of Moria's zombie army - shadows retain core personality traits.

keyEvents.title: Franky and Robin Battle Tararan
keyEvents.description: Franky and Robin engage in combat with Tararan and General Zombies on a bridge within Thriller Bark.
keyEvents.significance: The Straw Hats face the power of the General Zombies and use tactical thinking to survive.

keyEvents.title: Bridge Destroyed
keyEvents.description: Franky and Robin destroy a bridge on Thriller Bark to create distance from their pursuers.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the crew's willingness to use the environment tactically, even causing damage to the massive ship.

keyEvents.title: Brook Falls from the Sky
keyEvents.description: Brook dramatically falls from somewhere on Thriller Bark, landing near Franky and Robin.
keyEvents.significance: Brook's dramatic arrival marks an important moment in his interactions with the crew.

statusHistory.reason: Operational as Gecko Moria's base during the Thriller Bark arc
